Silo-name-and-description: Silo/Allows you to cut and store grass for feed.
Mill-name-and-description: Mill/Allows you to create flour from wheat and sugar from beets.
Earth-Obelisk-name-and-description: Earth Obelisk/Warps you to the mountains.
Water-Obelisk-name-and-description: Water Obelisk/Warps you to the beach.
Desert-Obelisk-name-and-description: Desert Obelisk/Warps you to the desert.
Junimo-Hut-name-and-description: Junimo Hut/Junimos will harvest crops around the hut for you.
Gold-Clock-name-and-description: Gold Clock/Prevents debris from appearing on your farm. Keeps fences from decaying.
Stable-name-and-description: Stable/Allows you to keep and ride a horse. Horse included.
Well-name-and-description: Well/Provides a place for you to refill your watering can.
Shipping-Bin-name-and-description: Shipping Bin/Throw items inside to sell them overnight.
Big-Coop-name-and-description: Big Coop/Houses 8 coop-dwelling animals. Comes with an incubator. Unlocks ducks.
Deluxe-Coop-name-and-description: Deluxe Coop/Houses 12 coop-dwelling animals. Comes with an auto-feed system. Unlocks rabbits.
Big-Barn-name-and-description: Big Barn/Houses 8 barn-dwelling animals. Allows animals to give birth. Unlocks goats.
Deluxe-Barn-name-and-description: Deluxe Barn/Houses 12 barn-dwelling animals. Comes with an auto-feed system. Unlocks sheep and pigs.
Slime-Hutch-name-and-description: Slime Hutch/Raise up to 20 slimes. Fill water troughs and slimes will create slime balls.
Shed-name-and-description: Shed/An empty building. Fill it with whatever you like! The interior can be decorated.
Big-Shed-name-and-description: Big Shed/Doubles the size of the shed. The interior can be decorated.
Stone-Cabin-name-and-description: Cabin/A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.
Plank-Cabin-name-and-description: Cabin/A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.
Log-Cabin-name-and-description: Cabin/A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.
Greenhouse-name-and-description: Greenhouse/A place to grow crops from any season, year round!
Mine-Elevator-name-and-description: Mine Elevator/Quickly travel between any mine elevators you construct. You can only build one per mine level.
Fish-Pond-name-and-description: Fish Pond/Raise fish and harvest their produce. Fish multiply over time.
sapling-description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature {{itemName}} tree. Bears fruit in the {{season}}. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
item-rice-description: A basic grain often served under vegetables.
boots-509-description: The fuzzy lining keeps your ankles so warm.
boots-510-description: Designed with extreme weather in mind.
boots-512-description: It's said these can withstand the hottest magma.
boots-513-description: A curious energy permeates the fabric.
boots-514-description: An iridium weave gives them a purple sheen.
boots-515-description: It's the height of country fashion.
boots-804-description: Made with love by Emily. 100% compostable!
boots-806-description: The buckle's made of solid gold.
